dcterms:creator: L. Lugosch
M. Ravanelli
P. Ignoto
V. S. Tomar
Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: FSC includes 30,043 English utterances, recorded at 16 kHz, resulting in 31 intent classes in total.
dcterms:title: Fluent Speech Commands (FSC)

dcterms:creator: E. Bastianelli
A. Vanzo
P. Swietojanski
V. Rieser
dcterms:description: The SLURP dataset comprises around 56 hours of audio of people interacting with a home assistant, with the addition of 43.5 hours of synthetic data. Each utterance is annotated with 3 semantics: scenario, action, and entity.
dcterms:title: Spoken Language Understanding Resource Package (SLURP)
